sense.def:
The outside of a container or building
je del tisti posode ali stavbe, ki obdaja ves preostali del.

seg.quote: Examine the property closely from the outside.
...a wooden shed that stood against the outside wall.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
outside a building, place, or country
, ni v notranjosti stavbe, kraja ali države.

Kadar govorimo o svetu, ki je
outside
, imamo v mislih stvari, ki se dogajajo ali obstajajo kje drugje, ne pri nas doma ali v naši okolici.

seg.quote: They don't want to go out into the outside world.

sense.def:
V Veliki Britaniji so
the outside lanes
tisti vozni pasovi širokih cest, ki so najbližje sredini.

Osebe ali stvari, ki so
outside a group, range, or organization
, niso vključene v skupino, vrsto ali organizacijo.

seg.quote: The bill was supported by a mass movement outside Parliament.
The pipeline was outside his range of responsibility.
Since 1974, no outside body has questioned the advice.

sense.def:
Kar se zgodi
outside a particular period of time
, se ne zgodi v določenem obdobju.

seg.quote: You'll have to do it outside office hours.
